Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: na vah janita hai aur na jany
aur na koee usaka samakaksh hai.
kaho, "main sharan leta hoon, prakat karanevaale rab kee
jo kuchh bhee usane paida kiya usakee buraee se
aur andhere kee buraee se jabaki vah ghus aae
aur gaantho mein phoonk maarane-vaalon kee buraee se
aur eershyaalu kee buraee se, jab vah eershya kare.
kaho, "main sharan leta hoon manushyon ke rab kee
vasavasa daalanevaale, khisak jaanevaale kee buraee se
jo manushyon ke seenon mein vasavasa daalata hain
jo jinnon mein se bhee hota hain aur manushyon mein se bhee
